episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] fell ill during a
Pokémon tournament and had to withdraw.
Apparently [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] had caught a cold...
How are you feeling, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Oh, you don’t need to stand up. Please don’t
push yourself.

I was so worried when I heard you fell ill,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...

so I bought some food that will help you
feel better.
Do you have an appetite?
All right, that’s good...

Once you get some energy back, I think you’ll start
to feel better.

I know a lot about what to do when you’re feeling
under the weather.
I used to be sick almost all the time...
If you want me to do anything, let me know.
Then, Wally kindly stayed by your side...
Yup, your face is looking a bit better.
(Thank Wally.)
Oh, it’s nothing, really...
But I’m happy if I was helpful, even just a little!
(Say he’s reliable and thank him.)
Really? Hehe...

You can rely on me more from now on, if
you’d like.

You’re very special to me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...

Well then, make sure to go to bed early and get a
good rest for today.

Once [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] recovered, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
went to find Wally during training...
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You’re back to your energetic self! I’m glad that
cold didn’t drag on.
No, no, I didn’t do anything...
Since we have people like Trista on Pasio...
I was honestly worried that I might be a bother.

But I remembered how you always take care of
people around you...
and I decided to be honest with my feelings.
Looking back...

When I went to Norman to ask for a Pokémon
in Hoenn, and when I asked Brendan to be my
rival...
that took a lot of courage.
But since I’ve been on Pasio...

I think I’ve been able to express my feelings
without needing as much courage as before.
And because of that, I have more friends...

I think meeting you was also a big part of the
reason I changed, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

So if I was able to give back to you because of
this cold, I’m happy.
(Tell him you’re happy.)

I’m also happy that you’re feeling better,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

(Say you want to do something
in return.)
Whaaa?! O-OK, then...
Gotta be honest with my feelings...
So, could I ask you for a battle, right now?
Hehe, yay!

Now that you’re feeling better, hit me with all
your energy, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
